messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] California R-4
messages.msgSnippet: You can file an R-4 affidavit if you live in the state of California.  Which basically means that you are a private school.  It  doesn t matter if you only
messages.messageBody:
You can file an R-4 affidavit if you live in the state of California.  Which basically means that you are a private school.  It  doesn't matter if you only have a few students (your kids).  You can get one through the County Office of Education.  This site should have all of the information: http://www.hsc.org/ you need to get started.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: kids4god1@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com ; Unschooling-dotcom-owner@egroups.com ; unschoolingcheap@egroups.com ; Unschooling-in-IL@egroups.com ; CCU-list@egroups.com
Sent: Monday, August 07, 2000 2:23 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] California R-4


Someone mentioned an "R-4 Affidavit" filed in CA.

Can you give me more specific info?

KIDS4GOD Learning Co.
